resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

fields.description: In Ti Studio it would be awesome to set breakpoints in source code (xml, controllers) to aid in creating applications. Investigation should look at creating a source map during the Uglifyjs AST process and the Alloy xml parse process. Once the source map is created how will we hook into Ti Studio/Eclipse debugger system. This task should have subtasks that further break down and scope this task.
fields.summary: Investigate adding  debugger support - see description
